room_title: Escape room "Podunk" by Escape the Pike in Worcester
room_description: A solar flare has destroyed the grid. Life as you know it no longer exists. Resources have run out. People are struggling to survive in the midst of chaos. Is there anywhere to turn? Uncle Mike always said something like this would happen. You thought he was crazy. You remember him talking about a secret bunker. He said to go there if things got bad. Would there be relief and sustenance there? Protection from dangers? It has become necessary to find out. You manage your way to Podunk and have just found the entrance. What lies behind the door? Will it help you thrive? You must enter in and find out.
